feature_data.name: Biometric Authentication
feature_data.description: Uses fingerprint and face recognition for user authentication

analysis_result.reasoning: Biometric data processing requires special safeguards under GDPR Article 9. While consent is explicit and encryption is implemented, the storage duration and processing basis need clarification.
recommendations: Review legal basis for biometric processing

human_decision.reasoning: The biometric authentication feature has good technical safeguards (encryption, local processing) but needs stronger legal foundations. Recommend implementing explicit biometric consent flows, adding necessity justification documentation, and ensuring GDPR Article 9 compliance with clear legal basis beyond just consent.
